name: Bras d'Honneur SIGMA
description:
"Bras d'Honneur SIGMA" is a visual short story about a veteran and his fucked-up life.

It was written for the WAG Challenge and made in three days using Ren'Py.

This is a very simple short story with different paths and one ending.

"Bras d'Honneur SIGMA" couldn't exist without the amazing Ren'Py community. The art and sound credits can be found in the game.

Please, do send me a message here or on twitter (@iamleyeti) if you have comments or remarks about the game.
